results.title: Astragaloside IV reverses simvastatin-induced skeletal muscle injury by activating the AMPK-PGC-1alpha signalling pathway.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_astragaloside_A @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052064 @@@Astragaloside IV@@@ reverses @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@skeletal muscle injury@@@ by activating the AMPK-@GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_19017 @@@PGC-1alpha@@@ signalling pathway.

results.title: Severe Rhabdomyolysis Associated with Simvastatin and Role of Ciprofloxacin and Amlodipine Coadministration
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is among the most commonly used prescription medications for @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ reduction and the most common statin-related adverse drug reaction is @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@skeletal muscle toxicity@@@.

results.title: The influence of simvastatin at high dose and diltiazem on myocardium in rabbits, the biochemical study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@Diltiazem@@@ as CYP3A4 inhibitor, is a well recognized risk factor of @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@skeletal muscles myopathy@@@, if co-administered with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Jasińska M, Owczarek J, Orszulak-Michalak D. The influence of simvastatin at high dose and diltiazem on myocardium in rabbits, the biochemical study. Acta Pol Pharm. 2006 Sep-Oct;63(5):386-90. PMID: 17357590

results.title: Simvastatin pretreatment reduces the severity of limb ischemia in an experimental diabetes model.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@skeletal muscle injury@@@, characterized by tissue @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ and leucosequestration, was significantly less severe with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ pretreatment compared with the nondiabetic animals (P < .01).

citations.NLM: Köksoy C, Oziş E, Cakmak A, Yazgan U, Okcu-Heper A, Köksoy A, Demirpençe E, Deniz Dinçer U. Simvastatin pretreatment reduces the severity of limb ischemia in an experimental diabetes model. J Vasc Surg. 2007 Mar;45(3):590-6. PMID: 17257798

results.title: Validation of a clinically-relevant rodent model of statin-associated muscle symptoms for use in pharmacological studies.
results.text_hl: Contrastingly, the SIM50 model (50 mg kg-1 day-1 @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for 30 days) produced little evidence of significant @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@skeletal muscle damage@@@.

results.title: Metabolism and drug interactions of 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitors in transplant patients: are the statins mechanistically similar?
results.text_hl: Pharmacokinetic interaction with some of the 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitors, specifically @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, leads to an increased incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@muscle skeletal toxicity@@@ in transplant @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Christians U, Jacobsen W, Floren LC. Metabolism and drug interactions of 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitors in transplant patients: are the statins mechanistically similar? Pharmacol Ther. 1998 Oct;80(1):1-34. PMID: 9804052

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor-induced myopathy in the rat: cyclosporine A interaction and mechanism studies.
results.text_hl: In the Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@, very high, pharmacologically comparable dosages (150-1200 mg/kg/day) of structurally similar HMGRIs (@CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_L_647318 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C064146 @@@L-647, 318@@@) produced dose-related increases in the incidence and severity of @<m>DISEASE_Fasciculation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005207 @@@skeletal muscle degeneration@@@.

citations.NLM: Smith PF, Eydelloth RS, Grossman SJ, Stubbs RJ, Schwartz MS, Germershausen JI, Vyas KP, Kari PH, MacDonald JS. HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor-induced myopathy in the rat: cyclosporine A interaction and mechanism studies. J Pharmacol Exp Ther. 1991 Jun;257(3):1225-35. PMID: 1904494
